data.text: delta airlines really let this man sit next to me the whole flight without his mask /:

DOES THAT MASK WORK? As some airlines and countries like Germany and Austria ban less-efficient cloth masks, @EPA breaks down the effectiveness of different types of masks (with pictures). Will NYC train teachers + students on "proper" masking for delta?  https://t.co/jEh5J1nDYR https://t.co/PptMa3JINw

N95 masks, good fitting KN95 mask, KF94 masks, good fitting level 3 surgical masks... those appear to be the tools needed to best protect against Delta variant. Growing body of evidence says irregularities w/cloth masks don't help much in indoor settings https://t.co/QtEH3cK417
